channel.description: can anyone tell me how i can make it so i can see the beard on pimpscape?

item.title: Need help getting beard on pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

[quote=“MonkeyMad, post:10, topic:138512”]i know its its um sec, search this // array of 5 bytes defining the colors

scroll up a bit see something like this if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1)) playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else (SHULD BE NEAR END) If u dont see that replace it wit that[/quote]
can you try to explain it better? (yes I know, I am a noob)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting beard on pimpscape

item.title: Need help getting beard on pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @MonkeyMad MonkeyMad
item.description:
@MonkeyMad wrote:

i know its its um sec, search this // array of 5 bytes defining the colors

scroll up a bit see something like this if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1)) playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else (SHULD BE NEAR END) If u dont see that replace it wit that
